title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: Python/JS library with built-in Ollama LLM and embeddings integrations for building RAG & agents.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: Official Docker image that packages the Ollama server for easy containerized deployment.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui-lite
summary: Lightweight HTML-single-file drop-in UI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters (Maven Central).

title: mxschmitt/ollama-dart
summary: Unofficial Dart/Flutter package for integrating Ollama into mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-rust/ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama/ollama-hub
summary: Community registry of Modelfiles, tools, and extensions curated for Ollama.

title: ollama/ollama-docs
summary: Official documentation source (Markdown) published to ollama.ai.

title: ollama/ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# .NET client for Ollama with NuGet package support.

title: ollama/ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector options.

title: ollama/ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with CUDA drivers.

title: ollama/ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI copilot powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama/ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example for scaling Ollama models across a cluster.

title: ollama/ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama chat and code completion into the editor.

title: ollama/ollama-cli-chat
summary: Enhanced TUI chat client for Ollama with markdown rendering and history.

title: ollama/ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST API template that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints.
